brick_023.title: Twisted Briar Trail – Scene Triggers & Atmosphere

content.interruption: Flickering sigils along the trail roots glow, summoning one of the twin flame hellions.
content.atmosphere_shift: Wind shifts and carries laughter in reverse, path darkens with dripping moss.
content.foreshadow: User sees a reflection of themselves in a puddle, but the eyes belong to someone else.

sequence: User breath slows to match flickering flames.
A question is whispered—not asked aloud, but felt internally.
content.response: Altar glows faint silver, then fades, leaving behind a phrase scratched into nearby stone.

content.trigger_condition: Only appears if a user has completed 3+ side quests and visited 2 familiars.
content.event: Mysterious cloaked figure offers a riddle that changes based on moon phase.
outcome_options: Answer correctly: receive a lunar key fragment.
Answer poorly: you're marked by a shimmer that other NPCs react to.
